derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French, from Latin corpus 'body'

entry.def: A corps is a part of the army which has special duties.
The Corps is the United States Marine Corps.

entry.tran: (从事某种特殊工作的)一组人，一群人
entry.def: A corps is a small group of people who do a special job.

Sentence.sentence: Donna Fredrick's served with the Peace Corps for two years in Brazil.
She joined the Peace Corps after she graduated from the college because she wanted to do something to help other people
She had been brought up on a farm, so the Peace Corps assigned her to an agricultural project.
